doc:
Maurice Pialat https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maurice_Pialat 0 Maurice Pialat (French: [pjala]; 31 August 1925 – 11 January 2003) was a French film director, screenwriter and actor noted for the rigorous and unsentimental style of his films. His work is often described as being "realist", though many film critics acknowledge that it does not fit the traditional definition of realism. Maurice_Pialat ( French : [_pjala_] ; 31_August_1925 – 11_January_2003 ) was a_French_film_director , screenwriter_and_actor noted for the_rigorous_and_unsentimental_style of his_films . His_work is_often_described as being " realist " , though many_film_critics acknowledge that it does_not_fit the_traditional_definition of realism .
